data.text:
The days spent with Shinko Windy were busy but fulfilling. 
Along with that, my responsibilities as a trainer increased……
data.processed:
<story>The days spent with Shinko Windy were busy but fulfilling. 
<story>Along with that, my responsibilities as a trainer increased……

data.text:
You! Lately you've been slacking off! 
It's always work, work, work, work～!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>You! Lately you've been slacking off! 
<story>It's always work, work, work, work～!

data.text:
Your boss is me, Windy-chan, you know! 
Your respect towards your boss is lacking!
data.name: Shinko Windy

choices.text: It's proof that Windy's been doing well
choices.processed: <size=43>It's proof that Windy's been doing well</size>

data.processed:
<story>Your boss is me, Windy-chan, you know! 
<story>Your respect towards your boss is lacking!

data.text:
Muuu～! But, even then! 
There's no point if it's boring!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Muuu～! But, even then! 
<story>There's no point if it's boring!!

data.text:
I've had enough! I've already thought of a 
solution! Punishment time, starts now―!!
data.name: Shinko Windy

choices.text: Wait, what are you going to do……!?

data.processed:
<story>I've had enough! I've already thought of a 
<story>solution! Punishment time, starts now―!!

data.text:
After she ran off, I chased after her throughout the school. 
Eventually, in some bushes, I noticed a familiar pair of ears――
data.processed:
<story>After she ran off, I chased after her throughout the school. 
<story>Eventually, in some bushes, I noticed a familiar pair of ears――

data.text:
However, one part of the ground looked different. 
A pit fall…… I stepped around it to avoid―― but
data.processed:
<story>However, one part of the ground looked different. 
<story>A pit fall…… I stepped around it to avoid―― but

data.text: (Psshhhhhhhh!!)
data.processed: <story>(Psshhhhhhhh!!)

data.text:
Kyahahahaa! 
Welcome to Windy-chan's Punishment Territory!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Kyahahahaa! 
<story>Welcome to Windy-chan's Punishment Territory!

data.text:
First, as a welcome, a sprinkler attack! 
And then～…… watch your feet!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>First, as a welcome, a sprinkler attack! 
<story>And then～…… watch your feet!

data.text: (Thud!)
data.processed: <story>(Thud!)

data.text:
There's a pit fall there too～! 
That's what I'm saying～!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>There's a pit fall there too～! 
<story>That's what I'm saying～!

data.text:
Ah, since you'd be lonely down there, 
I got a friend for ya. Here!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Ah, since you'd be lonely down there, 
<story>I got a friend for ya. Here!

data.text:
It's a Toy～! ……Nishi shi♪ 
It looks good on you, Trainer♪
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>It's a Toy～! ……Nishi shi♪ 
<story>It looks good on you, Trainer♪

data.text:
I climbed out of the pitfall and 
approached Shinko Windy. When I did―
data.processed:
<story>I climbed out of the pitfall and 
<story>approached Shinko Windy. When I did―

data.text: (Snap! Shhhhhhhh!)
data.processed: <story>(Snap! Shhhhhhhh!)

data.text: Daahaa haa haa! You fell for it!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>Daahaa haa haa! You fell for it!

data.text:
Something wrapped around my ankle and pulled! In an instant, my 
world turned upside down, and a smug face was peering at me.
data.processed:
<story>Something wrapped around my ankle and pulled! In an instant, my 
<story>world turned upside down, and a smug face was peering at me.

data.text:
I got you♪ 
How's it feel to be hanging upside down?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>I got you♪ 
<story>How's it feel to be hanging upside down?

data.text:
This is a punishment, so I won't! 
Can't catch me now! Neener-neener!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>This is a punishment, so I won't! 
<story>Can't catch me now! Neener-neener!

data.text:
Ahh haa haa! 
Come and get me!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Ahh haa haa! 
<story>Come and get me!

data.text:
After that, I continued chasing after her, 
repeatedly getting caught in her mischief-making――
data.processed:
<story>After that, I continued chasing after her, 
<story>repeatedly getting caught in her mischief-making――

data.text:
What's wrong? 
Can't keep up?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>What's wrong? 
<story>Can't keep up?

data.text:
Ni shi shi, if you're like that, you've still got a 
long way to go to be Windy-chan's underling!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Ni shi shi, if you're like that, you've still got a 
<story>long way to go to be Windy-chan's underling!

data.text:
I pulled out the toy spider from earlier, 
in order to get revenge, but……!
data.processed:
<story>I pulled out the toy spider from earlier, 
<story>in order to get revenge, but……!

data.text: Shishimai-chan can take care of something like that!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: <story>Shishimai-chan can take care of something like that!

data.text:
Were you trying to prank Windy-chan 
with such an obvious move?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Were you trying to prank Windy-chan 
<story>with such an obvious move?

data.text:
Ah haa haa! You're so hopeless! 
Guess I'll have to teach you the secret to pranking!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Ah haa haa! You're so hopeless! 
<story>Guess I'll have to teach you the secret to pranking!

data.text:
――And that's why you make them wary of something else, 
and then you finish them off!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>――And that's why you make them wary of something else, 
<story>and then you finish them off!

data.text:
And if it's a really flashy feint, you can use that opening to 
set up the next trick! Using something like konnyaku or water!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>And if it's a really flashy feint, you can use that opening to 
<story>set up the next trick! Using something like konnyaku or water!

data.text:
Since then, I took lots of notes, and she would force me to come 
up with pranks on the spot. Then she would grade them.
data.processed:
<story>Since then, I took lots of notes, and she would force me to come 
<story>up with pranks on the spot. Then she would grade them.

data.text:
Hm? ……Fufuun. 
Of course!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Hm? ……Fufuun. 
<story>Of course!

data.text:
Part of being a devilish fiend, 
is doing things that nobody expects!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>Part of being a devilish fiend, 
<story>is doing things that nobody expects!

data.text:
You're gonna be like me! 
A prankster genius, just like Windy-chan!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
<story>You're gonna be like me! 
<story>A prankster genius, just like Windy-chan!

data.text:
I was supposed to be trying to stop Shinko Windy, and now all of 
a sudden I was taking lessons on making mischief.
data.processed:
<story>I was supposed to be trying to stop Shinko Windy, and now all of 
<story>a sudden I was taking lessons on making mischief.

data.text:
I wondered if there was a way to have her 
use her creativeness constructively……
data.processed:
<story>I wondered if there was a way to have her 
<story>use her creativeness constructively……

title: I'll Give You The Full Course!
